description: Smallest m such that A002110(n)+m is prime.
comments: Any composite a(n) would disprove Fortune's conjecture, see A005235. - _Jeppe Stig Nielsen_, Oct 31 2003
links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: nmax=2^16384; npd=1;n=1;npd=npd*Prime[n]; While[npd<nmax, tt=1; cp=npd+tt; While[ !(PrimeQ[cp]), tt=tt+2;cp=cp+2]; Print[tt]; n=n+1; npd=npd*Prime[n]] (* _Lei Zhou_, Feb 15 2005 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 02 2000
